Registration Form

"Life is meant to live through experiences. We need to live in the moment, not just to survive."

"The real joy in life is not we get But in what we give.The joy of giving, the joy of feeding and the joy of helping others makes you complete being."

Aasya wants you to be a part of this Wonderful experience.Become a member of aasya and together we can support others through their greatest hardships.

Be an agent of CHANGE - Be A Volunteer of AASYA & RISE AGAIN

Fill the membership form below to be a part of Our Family.

Terms & Conditions

  • Registration is mandatory for any joining’s.
  • Temporary ID will be provided for first 6 Months. Based on the service/performance /participation during the first 6 month’s period, permanent ID card will be given.
  • Volunteers should and must wear AASYA T-Shirt for any event/meeting they attend.
  • Every volunteer should contribute 100/- RUPEES every month irrespective of any event. Any contributions from your end should be transferred to AASYA FOUNDTION’s BANK ACCOUNT /PayTM Account. (AASYA Foundation /Volunteers/Members should not do any IN-Hand CASH transactions.
  • At any point of time, Foundation has full authority to cancel the membership / volunteer ship of a member in case of any DISCIPLINARY VIOLATION.
  • Every Volunteer SHOULD attend /participate atleast 1 EVENT PER MONTH (You will be exempted if there is any proper reason).If there is any exemption needed, you should inform your team lead/event lead/area head and get it approved prior the event.
  • Volunteers who do NOT attend for any 3 consecutive events (without any intimation / permission), will be treated INACTIVE and will be noted in MEMBERS TO BE ERMINATED list. If he/she is INACTIVE for 4 continuous events, will be strictly terminated from the foundation.
  • Every volunteer SHOULD attend the VOLUNTEER MEETING which will happen once in every 2 months.
  • If any volunteers misuse foundation funds for his/her personal purpose Legal Actions would be taken towards them.
  • If any Member/Volunteer is found misbehaving with other's, immediately Strict Action would be taken.
